title: The best rooftop patio in West Cap Hill!
posting_body: Looking to live in the heart of it all? 1355 Pearl is the perfect spot.
Weather it is grabbing coffee with a friend at Pablo’s, or a beer at The Park Tavern, the cities hottest spots are within walking distance of your new home!
This community features hardwood floors, concrete countertops, new appliances and free internet access.
A/C via Central Swamp Coolers • Additional Storage Available • BBQ Grills • Bike Racks • Bike Storage Available •
Card Operated Laundry • Complimentary Wi-Fi • Controlled Access •
On-Site Maintenance • Pet Friendly • Recycling Services •
Submit Work Requests Online • Online Payments Available • Branch Home Office Furniture Discount •

In Guarantee Apartment Amenities Ceiling Fans • Ceramic Floor Tiles • Concrete Countertops • Designer Lighting • Hardwood Floors • Refrigerator • Tiled Backsplashes • Walk-In Closets • FORTE Fitness Discount Mon-Fri:
